item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by A.A. Milne
Jennifer add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Is sex dirty? Only when it's being done right." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Chastityâ€”the most unnatural of all the sexual perversions, he added parenthetically, out of [author:Remy de Gourmont|78190]." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Sex is the most fun you can have without laughing." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Lily Tomlin
item.description: "We have reason to believe that man first walked upright to free his hands for masturbation." -- Lily Tomlin

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Prince
item.description: "Hard to say what's right when all I wanna do is wrong." -- Prince
